properties.areaDesc: Waters from Savannah GA to Altamaha Sound GA extending from 20 nm to 60 nm
properties.headline: Gale Watch issued January 3 at 3:41AM EST until January 5 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Charleston SC
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Small Craft Advisory, southwest winds 15 to 25
kt with gusts up to 30 kt and seas 4 to 7 feet expected. For
the Gale Watch, northwest winds 25 to 35 kt with gusts up to
40 kt and seas 6 to 9 feet possible.

* WHERE...Savannah to Altamaha Sound from 20 to 60 NM.

* WHEN...For the Small Craft Advisory, from 7 PM this evening to
7 PM EST Saturday. For the Gale Watch, from Saturday evening
through Sunday morning.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds can cause hazardous seas which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should consider altering plans to avoid possible
hazardous conditions.  Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter
course, and/or secure the vessel for severe wind and seas.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 7 PM EST SATURDAY... ...GALE WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY EVENING THROUGH SUNDAY MORNING
